	Vital Point AIOpen-source governance and decision support solutions that innovate on blockchain, mixed reality, and data.

Vital Point AIOpen-source governance and decision support solutions that innovate on blockchain, mixed reality, and data.


	
	Opportunity AwaitsThe internet is undergoing reinvention.  Self-sovereign identity, data protection, decentralization, encrypted communications are some of the pillars on which it's being built.  Blockchain, data science (including machine learning and artificial intelligence), and mixed reality are manufacturing this new world. They enable us to augment intuition - helping make faster/better decisions, are catalysts for the emergence of new forms of efficient organizations, and expand the boundaries of the world in which we interact and communicate.It's the open web - where individuals control data, middlemen and bureaucracy are eliminated, and censorship becomes a thing of the past.The future is coming.  Help us build it.

whether you're a wannabe blockchain, Data science, or mixed reality developer or someone who's been working in the field since the beginning - come share your story and your experience with others. 
	
	
            
        


		Join the Community
	


	
	Introducing Vital Point AIVital Point AI's Four Step Process

1


Welcome and train developersWe're looking for people of any experience/skill level interested in building the future. Vital Point Academy provides NEAR certified developer training that teaches you to how to build incredible experiences and open web applications on NEAR Protocol. 2


Recruit the collaborators and enablersWe welcome domain experts, product managers and investors willing to identify domain challenges and opportunities, manage product development, provide specialized knowledge, or furnish resource support to ensure development efforts produce effective solutions.3

Support and grow the communityVital Point AI is growing an inclusive and supportive community with useful resources and an organization where every member has a stake and contributes to its success.  People are rewarded for the important roles they play in helping solve real-world issues while building the open web future.4


Build Incredible SolutionsVital Point AI is has several projects on the go at any time.  Get involved in them, work on other's, or start your own.
Vital Point AI embraces diversity and inclusiveness.  We value initiative and self-discipline.  In short, no matter who you are or what your skill level, we want you to succeed.  If you have the desire, motivation, persistence and discipline to put in the consistent effort to continually learn and become a great developer - we can have a long and collaborative relationship where everyone wins.

AaronChief Facilitator
            
        Innovation is what happens when people with tech expertise understand the challenges people with domain expertise face and decide to do something about it because they have the time, interest, and resources to do so.Vital Point AI aims to ensure people with the desire to build can and people with challenges can find and collaborate with developers that can help solve them.





	
	Vital Point AI aims to link developers with domain experts and support to solve real-world issues and invent amazing new experiences... 
	
	
            
        


		Join the Community
	


	
	What is NEAR?

near resources



Beginner's Guide to the NEAR blockchain

NEAR Community
NEAR blogThe technology explanations making up NEAR

Vital Point AI leverages NEAR protocol as a foundational pillar of everything it does.  The NEAR collective is a global collection of organizations collaboratively building NEAR.It includes a number of extraordinary teams, championship-level competitive programmers, and a NEAR foundation backed by the best names in the crypto industry. Vital Point AI runs a guild as part of the NEAR collective's guild program. Individuals, clubs, leaders, influencers, experts, communicators and others who believe in the project can start guilds like this one and spread the word.Nice - but what exactly is NEAR?Technical ExplanationNEAR is a sharded, developer-friendly, proof-of-stake blockchain.  It is a brand new and fundamentally reimagined layer 1 protocol designed to independently power the base of the emerging Open Web stack.  It is highly scalable and low-cost.Less Technical TranslationIt's revolutionary blockchain tech that you can think of as a public, community-run platform (or cloud) that

the emerging Open Web stack.  It is highly scalable and low-cost.Less Technical TranslationIt's revolutionary blockchain tech that you can think of as a public, community-run platform (or cloud) that makes it easy, low-cost and effective to build amazing decentralized apps that people can actually use without worrying about growth issues.

Vital Point ACADEMy teaches and supports people who want to become developers. learn about near protocol and other tech to build things that help achieve widespread open web adoption.
	
	
            
        


		Start Learning
	


	
	
            
        Vital Point Academy
	
	The Academy covers everything from beginner to advanced concepts leading to NEAR developer certification and beyond.  It allows anyone, with any level of experience or knowledge, to learn to develop amazing decentralized applications on NEAR Protocol.

            
        Community
	
	Vital Point AI is constantly working to build its community through local and global initiatives.  In addition to developers, we welcome domain experts, investors and people with ideas to set the favorable conditions for constant and ongoing innovation.

Production
	
	With all the conditions and support in place, Vital Point AI aims to link developers and domain experts with a view to production of decentralized, open web enabled applications that solve real-world problems.  We are aiming to see a variety of projects emerge and thrive.


	
	
	
	The Vital Point AI Community(free, open, inclusive)If you want to help build solutions to interesting challenges - we want to see you succeed.
	
	
	
	
            
        Community Benefits

The Vital Point AI Community(free, open, inclusive)If you want to help build solutions to interesting challenges - we want to see you succeed.
	
	
	
	
            
        Community Benefits

	
	
            
        Access the Vital Point Academy.  Resources to help you learn exactly what you need to learn as quickly as possible to start developing decentralized applications using NEAR and related tech
            
        Support of other friendly, like-minded people all trying to create the open web
            
        local in-person workshops and webinars, and events to get questions answered, network and socialize (eventually)
            
        Ability to work on projects that you care about (or start your own)
            
        Forge friendships, partnerships, and potentially even start-ups with other members
            
        Ability to build dapps using NEAR's very developer and user friendly protocol

Aaron | Vital Point AIHi, my name is Aaron and run the place - sort of.  Right now we need a bit of direction and guidance to start things moving in the direction I envision.  However, I'm setting the conditions to let the organization take on a life of its own.  Think of me more as a Chief Facilitator than CEO.I started development on Ethereum and am a graduate of the Consensys Ethereum Developer Bootcamp.  I compete in blockchain hackathons such as those run by EthGlobal,  Ready Layer One, and Hack the Rainbow.  I build blockchain and other stuff and I've even won a couple prizes.As a self-taught developer - I certainly don't claim to know it all, but I'm super excited about the future.  I wish I had the resources and support of something like Vital Point AI and Vital Point Academy at my disposal at the beginning of this journey.  Better late than never...

Frequently Asked Questions
	
		
			
				
					
				
				Is it really free to join Vital Point AI?
			
			Yep.  $0.  It doesn't cost anything.  In fact, you might be rewarded with NEAR tokens as a contributing member.  If Vital Point AI succeeds, so do you.
		
	

	
		
			
				
					
				
				Do I need to be a programmer or developer to join?
			
			Nope, but if you want to be, you can learn how to develop blockchain apps using the Vital Point Academy.  Vital Point AI needs all sorts of people with all sorts of diverse backgrounds and capabilities.  It's when people with tech skills and people with knowledge/ideas meet and get excited that innovation sparks.

Is NEAR protocol worth investing time/energy into?
			
			I think it is, or I wouldn't have based everything happening at Vital Point AI on it.  Having developed on Ethereum - I'm super excited about the potential and usability of NEAR.  Ideally, it's going to co-exist with a wide variety of other blockchain and Web 3.0 tech.  With the outstanding team and helpful community being built around the protocol, I seriously can't see it doing anything but succeed and proliferate.

Why is NEAR better than Ethereum?
			
			I wouldn't say it's necessarily better -  it's just that they're different.  NEAR came along after Ethereum so had the advantage of taking a look at all of Ethereum's perceived shortcomings and was able to bake solutions to them in at the beginning.  Ethereum has been trying to patch the plane as it's flying but they're certainly making progress.  I believe they'll co-exist, but having developed on both -I find it far easier and more intuitive getting something working on NEAR.
		
	

	
		
			
				
					
				
				Is Vital Point AI built on the open web?
			
			Eventually, all of Vital Point AI's resources and tools will incorporate open web technologies.  Some things simply aren't built yet.  Web 2.0 tech does work well for community building and we have to start somewhere.

Is Vital Point AI only focused on NEAR?
			
			A huge amount of what Vital Point AI does is focused on NEAR because it's simply awesome; however, there's a lot more needed to build decentralized apps that solve problems.  For instance - storage is important so we're currently using IPFS, Textile, and Ceramic as decentralized storage for Dapp information.  We also use Ceramic Network for self-sovereign identity. We use Unity for mixed reality development.  There's a wide array of open web tech out there and it should be used where it makes sense. Consequently, Vital Point AI touches on all those areas as well.
		
	

	
	
            
        


		Join the Community
